name: Lucas Clark Prototypes: Four Seasons, Gravity Switch Slam, and Tank Revenge Races
name_original: Lucas Clark Prototypes: Four Seasons, Gravity Switch Slam, and Tank Revenge Races
description:
This is a collection of 3 prototype games:

Four Seasons:  Change the colors of the interactive balls cycling throught the four seasons.

Gravity Switch Slam: Use your abilty to control gravity to smash the cubes into eachother to gain score, but be quick your on a timer.

Tank Revenge Races: A 3 player competitive game where you shoot your freinds to gain the speed advantage and slow your oponents down. Be in the lead when the timer runs out to win the race.
